segments.text: As I glance at the woman, I see her so focused, still drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It almost feels surreal to see her not noticing the flood below her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why isn't she reacting to the puddle forming at her feet?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is pooling dangerously close, and she seems oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but admire her concentration though, it's remarkable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then there's the boy, practically climbing the cabinet now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can feel my heart racing as he reaches for those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool doesn’t look stable at all; it’s going to tip any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl, standing there with her hand raised, looks so hopeful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think it’s sweet how they’re working together, but it’s so risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The chaos of the kitchen contrasts sharply with the tranquility outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder what the woman would do if she realized what was happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's as if she's in her own bubble, unaware of the impending disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would wake her up from this domestic trance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Perhaps if she took a moment to look around, she could prevent a mishap.
segments.speaker: PAR
